product.title: Unbranded Ionic Hair Dryer and Styler with 2.56 Inch Oval Barrel for Frizz Control Fast Drying
product.title_excluding_brand: Ionic Hair Dryer and Styler with 2.56 Inch Oval Barrel for Frizz Control Fast Drying
product.description:
Dry, curly, straightened, smooth - all in one!
4-In-1 Hair Dryer Brush: Your styling guide! Easily achieve blow-drying, curling, straightening and plumping to meet all hairstyle needs. With advanced ceramic coating and 30W + negative ions, it effectively reduces thermal damage while locking in moisture, leaving hair smoother and healthier.
Size: as shown in the picture
Shipping: Ships within the United States at no additional cost to provide our customers with a good shopping experience (generally 2-7 days after delivery).
Note: Non-defective returns need to be shipped to the return warehouse address designated by us by contacting customer service. We will no longer accept return applications sent to other warehouses.
product.description_html:
Dry, curly, straightened, smooth - all in one!
4-In-1 Hair Dryer Brush: Your styling guide! Easily achieve blow-drying, curling, straightening and plumping to meet all hairstyle needs. With advanced ceramic coating and 30W + negative ions, it effectively reduces thermal damage while locking in moisture, leaving hair smoother and healthier.
Size: as shown in the picture
Shipping: Ships within the United States at no additional cost to provide our customers with a good shopping experience (generally 2-7 days after delivery).

product.description_full:
Dry, curly, straightened, smooth - all in one!
4-In-1 Hair Dryer Brush: Your styling guide! Easily achieve blow-drying, curling, straightening and plumping to meet all hairstyle needs. With advanced ceramic coating and 30W + negative ions, it effectively reduces thermal damage while locking in moisture, leaving hair smoother and healthier.
Size: as shown in the picture
Shipping: Ships within the United States at no additional cost to provide our customers with a good shopping experience (generally 2-7 days after delivery).
Note: Non-defective returns need to be shipped to the return warehouse address designated by us by contacting customer service. We will no longer accept return applications sent to other warehouses. *   * Nourish and protect your hair: Say goodbye to the heat damage of traditional styling tools. The negative ion hair dryer brush features 30W + negative ions and an advanced ceramic coating that ensures a more even heat distribution while preventing heat damage. It effectively reduces frizz and static electricity, leaving your hair smooth, silky and fluffy.
    * Personalized hair styling: The hair dryer styling brush comes with 3 adjustable settings (cold, low and high) to suit a variety of hair types and styling preferences. Whether your hair is fine, thick, curly or straight, you can easily customize your styling experience to achieve the desired look
   
   
 *   * Drying and styling in one step: Our 4-in-1 multifunctional Hot Air Styling Brush combines drying, curling, straightening, and plumping functions into one device. Suitable for all hair types, it can quickly blow dry hair while increasing the volume and shape of hair, and easily achieve salon-quality results without additional styling tools.
    * Quick and easy styling: Use our 360 ° airflow system and powerful 1000W output to easily achieve a smooth and ideal hairstyle. The 2.56-inch (65mm) oval brush head combines with nylon needles and tufted bristles to effectively smooth hair and prevent tangles. In addition, the ALCI safety plug adds an extra layer of safety.
   
   
 *   * Professional hair care at home: Our 0.97 in 4 hair dryer and styler volumizer weighs only 1 lb, feels comfortable to hold, and will not tire for long use. Its sleek, ergonomic design makes it stylish and portable, making it perfect for home, salon and travel use by significant others!

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
